Class LuceneUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.module.aim.util.LuceneUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LuceneUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ! ! ! The serial version needs to be changed if the index generating algorithm ! ! is changed, so index will be regenerated ! ! ! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

      • search

        public static org.apache.lucene.document.Document[] search(java.lang.String index,
                                                           java.lang.String field,
                                                           java.lang.String searchString,
                                                           java.lang.String searchMode)

      • findActivitiesMoreLikeThis

        public static java.util.List<ActivityLuceneDocument> findActivitiesMoreLikeThis(java.lang.String index,
                                                                                java.lang.String origSearchString,
                                                                                java.lang.String langCode,
                                                                                int maxLuceneResults)
        Searches for similar AmpActivityVersionS based on title similarity
        The settings are tuned for short text strings (the title), so if you adapt this to search on fields like AmpActivityFields.getDescription() make sure to tune MoreLikeThis.setMinDocFreq(int) and MoreLikeThis.setMinTermFreq(int)
        Parameters:
        index - the LuceneUtil#ACTVITY_INDEX_DIRECTORY
        origSearchString - the text searched as AmpActivityFields.getName() which in activityToLuceneDocument(ActivityLuceneDocument) is indexed as "title"
        langCode - for multilingual activities is the lang code we are looking for If activity is NOT multilingual, the language code is not used, even if the default language is not English
        maxLuceneResults - the maximum number of results returned
        Returns:
        a list of similar AmpActivityVersion titles
        See Also:
        MoreLikeThis

      • search

        public static org.apache.lucene.document.Document[] search(java.lang.String index,
                                                           java.lang.String field,
                                                           java.lang.String origSearchString,
                                                           int maxLuceneResults,
                                                           boolean retry,
                                                           java.lang.String searchMode)

      • createHelp

        public static void createHelp(javax.servlet.ServletContext sc,
                              ModuleInstance modInstance,
                              java.lang.String lang)
                       throws DgException
        Uses isDir() method to determine whether index directory exists or not. If directory doesn't exist create new one using addUpdatehelp(boolean)
        Throws:
        DgException

      • addUpdatehelp

        public static void addUpdatehelp(boolean update,
                                 javax.servlet.ServletContext sc,
                                 ModuleInstance modInstance,
                                 java.lang.String lang)
                          throws DgException
        Converts html formatted help topics body to plain text format. Creates lucene-index directory if it doesn't exist. Adds or updates converted data to lucene-index directory using indexArticle(String,String,String) method.

        In update mode method updates only data which have last modified date is greater than the last modified date of lucene-index directory.

        Parameters:
        update - if true then method is used to update the lucene-index directory otherwise to create new lucene-index directory and add data to it.
        Throws:
        DgException
        See Also:
        HelpSearchData

                                          java.lang.String searchString,
                                          javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
        Searches searchString in the indexDirectory for fields. Returns founded hits
        Parameters:
        field -
        searchString -
        Returns:

      • indexArticle

        public static void indexArticle(java.lang.String article,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String titTrnKey,
                                java.lang.String lang,
                                javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. instead use LuceneWorker.addItemToIndex(Object, ServletContext, String) method
        Creates Document using createDocument(String,String,String). Adds newly created document to lucene help directory
        Parameters:
        article - body of help topic
        title - title of help topic
        titTrnKey - translation key used to translate title
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createHelpDocument

        public static org.apache.lucene.document.Document createHelpDocument(java.lang.String article,
                                                                     java.lang.String title,
                                                                     java.lang.String titTrnKey,
                                                                     java.lang.String lang)
        Creates new Document. Adds fields title,titletrnKey,article to document using passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        article - body of help topic
        title - title of help topic
        titTrnKey - translation key used to translate title
        Returns:
        newly created document
